sub_title: Chief Executive Officer at Pervatech BV membrane solutions
summary:
Experienced Market oriented Innovation and Business Development Leader with dedication and drive to initiate, develop and successfully commercialize new business based on advanced technology.

Believes in turning ideas into reality by connecting people, technology and business. Strong strategic thinker able to connect all stakeholder expectations.

From a background in chemical technology and materials science I have extended my knowledge and experience to Business Development, Life Sciences, In-Vitro Diagnostics, cGMP manufacturing, Engineering, renewable / sustainable energy, alternative automotive engine technology and fuels,  and High-Tech / Mass Manufacturing.

Proven track record of driving innovation programs in highly regulated industries from R&D to commercialization by leveraging in-house capabilities and leading legal and intellectual property aspects of external collaborations.

On the commercial side I realized significant revenues with OEM’s in co-development activities.

Main specialties include R&D Strategy and Management, Business Strategy and Execution, Lean Innovation, project management in high regulated industry, building and maintaining networks with key technology leaders.

My management style is based on people empowerment, sharing passion, inspiration, open communication and creation of a positive and challenging (eager-to-win) team spirit. 

Strength’s are best met in challenging technical and business situations. I get energized in a highly professional environment which is aiming to be the leader in its segment with an entrepreneurial, innovative and can-do mentality. 

Personal interests : family and friends, music, technology and personal development

profile_positions.description:
Pervatech provides cutting edge membrane technology solutions for different applications in (fine)-chemical, pharma, bio-tech, flavour & fragrances and food & beverages industry. Our dedicated team identifies and develops together with our customers innovative and energy efficient processes.

Our core product is the hybrid silica HybSi Acid Resistant membrane. This membrane has superious chemical and thermal stability, excellent selectivity and flux; it is manufactured in a state-of-the-art clean room facility.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description: TenCate Protective Fabrics is a leading global producer of protective fabrics. We design, develop and produce a broad range of products engineered to satisfy the continually evolving needs of industry workers, as well as firefighters and military and police personnel.
profile_positions.title: Director Product Innovation

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Commercial Function; Business Development, Marketing and Sales

Pervatech provides cutting edge membrane technology solutions for different applications in (fine)-chemical, pharma, bio-tech, flavour & fragrances and food & beverages industry. Our dedicated team identifies and develops together with our customers innovative and energy efficient processes.

Our core product is the hybrid silica HybSi Acid Resistant membrane. This membrane has superious chemical and thermal stability, excellent selectivity and flux; it is manufactured in a state-of-the-art clean room facility.
profile_positions.title: Chief Commercial Officer

profile_positions.description:
Experienced R&D and Business Development leader for Diagnostics products.
Defined strategy innovation and development roadmap for business unit
Responsible for large OEM accounts and new business development. Successfully acquired mulit-M$ new OEM business in IVD for which we collaborate in co-development projects for new technology.
Lead R&D teams in Deventer (The Netherlands) and Delhi (India)
Technologies and products in Hematology, Immunoassays (ELISA, Rapid Tests), Histology, Clinical Chemistry, Molecular Diagnostics and Chemiluminescence.
Products are designed and manufactured under CE/IVD, ISO13485 and cGMP standards. Introduced Design for Six Sigma and Lean Innovation methods.
Initiated and build strategic collaborations with high tech companies and institutes in diagnostics, high performance chemistry, separations and purification, photovoltaic's.
Designed and realized a new R&D Lab.
profile_positions.title: Global Director, R&D and Business Development, Diagnostics   - Market oriented innovation leader

profile_positions.description:
Global responsible for R&D in Laboratory and Clinical Products. Lead R&D team located in Deventer and coordinate with Global R&D in the US.

Product development processes based on stage gate methodology. Together with Marketing director responsible for project selection, building business case and execution of the projects. 

Project in this time include among others hematology reagents, ultra-pure solvents, SolidPhaseExtraction.

Contacts with technology institutes and companies in membrane purification and crystallization
profile_positions.title: Global R&D Manager Laboratory and Clinical Products

profile_positions.description:
Mallinckrodt Baker b.v., based in Deventer, The Netherlands, is developing, producing and selling high purity chemical products for laboratory, analytical, farmaceutical, clinical and high tech (IC and PV) markets. 

The R&D team (11 fte) which I was leading focusses mainly on clinical and PV markets and acts as such as the global knowledge center within Mallinckrodt Baker International. Further, we are giving application support in IC industry and Process Chromatography.
profile_positions.title: Research & Development Manager

profile_positions.company: CNG Net heet vanaf 1 january 2016 PitPoint clean fuels
profile_positions.description:
Young company (7 fte) in the field of development and operation of a nation-wide network of natural gas refuelling station. Activities: consultancy on clean mobility, realization and operation of natural gas fuel stations, marketing of natural gas vehicles, development of future sustainable mobility on biogas.
Position : Project manager.
•	Set-up of project organisation for realisation of  natural gas fuel stations, inc. business cases, legal and safety regulations.
•	Development of knowledge and advice centre on environment friendly and sustainable mobility, including renewable energy sources, alternative engine technology / fuels, air quality and car park economy.
•	Build network with key automotive manufacturers related to alternative fuels and engine technology
•	Feasibility study completed on local LNG production from biogas
•	Set-up of operations management with suppliers
•	Purchase of energy and energy infrastructure
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Element Six  develops, produces and sells high-tech diamond product for industrial applications (mechanical, thermal, optical). Product characteristics in nm range.
Position : Development Manager (13 fte). Besides regular R&D management, a specific task was to re-orient the development department which was in bad shape after 4 reorganisations of the company.
•	Introduction project management structure, further professionalisation (incl. Balanced Scorecard). 
•	Definition of the technology roadmap based on the 5-yr business and marketing plan.
•	Improvement of communication and co-operation with Marketing & Sales. Formation of market-teams, set-up of business cases. Improvement of market focus.
•	Direct the synthesis plant in UK on new specifications (research funding from NL to UK)
•	Technology: diamond products, machine development, lithography, lasercutting, EDM.
profile_positions.title: Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Position : R&D manager Europe – HSE Coordinator World.  R&D manager (12 fte), MT member in Eibergen plant, responsibility for R&D coordination and support for Thin Wheels Europe (5 plants) and World coordinator Health, Safety en Environment for Thin Wheels (13 plants).
•	Product and Process development projects for European plants (NL, F, I (2x), Poland).
•	Advice World Business Management on R&D strategy (both product and process oriented) 
•	Knowledge transfer and assistance on HSE subjects and policies to worldwide plants.
•	Introduction Design Of Experiments 
•	Technology transfer resin and production technology to Bonded division R&D (USA, Italy). 
•	Introduction ISO 14001 environment management system in plant Eibergen (NL).

In addition Dutch representative in the  “Federation of European Producers of Abrasives” (FEPA) in Paris. Member of the technical commission “Bonded”; a.o. ISO-EN- and Safety normalisation. Member of Management Committee.
profile_positions.title: R&D Manager Europe - HSE coordinator

profile_positions.description: Full time musician (trumpet) during military service
profile_positions.title: Musician in military band "Fanfareorkest Bereden Wapens"

profile_positions.description: Synthesis, characterzation and perforamnce study of microporous ceramic gas separation membranes
